border.description: Apply a border style to the component.

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

disable-resize-watcher.description: Prevents the automatic opening or closing of the drawer when resized, based on whether the device is mobile or desktop.
disable-resize-watcher.description_zh: 防止在调整大小时自动打开或关闭抽屉，具体取决于设备是移动设备还是桌面设备。

disable-route-watcher.description: Disables opening of navigation drawer when route changes.
disable-route-watcher.description_zh: 禁止在路线更改时打开导航抽屉。

elevation.description: The elevation of the component is acceptable from 0 to 24. You can read more on the Elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page 浏览更多信息。

expand-on-hover.description: Collapses the drawer to a mini-variant until hovering with the mouse.
expand-on-hover.description_zh: 将抽屉折叠成一个迷你变体，直到鼠标悬停。

floating.description: A floating drawer has no visible container (no border-right).
floating.description_zh: 浮动抽屉没有可见的容器（没有右边框）。

image.description: Apply a specific background image to the component.
image.description_zh: 将特定背景图像应用于组件。

location.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

mobile-breakpoint.description: Sets the specified movement breakpoint for the component. This will apply an alternate style for mobile devices, such as a temporary prop, or activate a bottom prop when a breakpoint value is met. Setting the value to 0 disables this feature.
mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 为组件设置指定的移动断点。这将为移动设备应用替代样式，如 temporary prop，或在满足断点值时激活 bottom prop。将值设置为 0 将禁用此功能。

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.
name.description_zh: 为布局注册指定特定名称。

order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.
order.description_zh: 根据组件的注册顺序调整组件的顺序。

permanent.description: The drawer remains visible regardless of screen size.
permanent.description_zh: 无论屏幕尺寸如何，抽屉都保持可见。

rail.description: Sets the component width to the rail-width value.
rail.description_zh: 将元件宽度设置为 rail-width 值。

rail-width.description: Sets the width for the component when rail is enabled.
rail-width.description_zh: 设置启用导轨时元件的宽度。

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面 获取更多有关信息

scrim.description: Determines whether an overlay is used when a temporary drawer is open. Accepts true/false to enable background, and string to define color.
scrim.description_zh: 确定在打开临时抽屉时是否使用覆盖。接受 true/false 以启用背景，接受 string 以定义颜色。

sticky.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

temporary.description: The temporary drawer sits above its application and uses a scrim (overlay) to darken the background.
temporary.description_zh: 临时抽屉位于它的应用程序上方，并使用一个scrim（覆盖层）使背景变暗。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: An event that is raised when a component's model-value changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model-value 更改时引发的事件。

events.name: update:rail
events.description: Event that is emitted when the rail model changes.
events.description_zh: 轨道模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: append
slots.description: A slot at the bottom of the drawer.

slots.name: image
slots.description: Used to modify v-img properties when using the src prop.
slots.description_zh: 用于在使用 src 属性时修改 v-img 属性。

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Slots at the top of drawers
